title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Contextualized Educational Material Development for HPV Vaccine Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the mechanism and preventive efficacy of the HPV vaccine at 85% or higher accuracy
Learners can interpret vaccination-related statistical data to create risk-benefit analysis tables
Learners can convey HPV vaccine information to peers within 10 minutes using digital/print materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
